description: Try our easy to follow Fish In Coconut Stew recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fish In Coconut Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tomatoes, ripe, skinned, seeded and chopped
1 red capsicum, seeded and thinly sliced
1 green capsicum, seeded and thinly sliced
800g firm white fish, cut into large chunks or strips
1 tomato, ripe, skinned, seeded, and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes, until tender but not browned. Add the tomatoes and the capsicums. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 20 minutes, until the vegetables have softened and released their juices. Stir in the coconut milk and tomato paste and return to a boil. Season with salt and pepper.
Meanwhile, make the salsa. Mix all the ingredients together and spoon into a serving bowl. Set aside to allow the flavors to blend.
Add the fish to the coconut milk mixture and cook, stirring occasionally, for 7 minutes, until the fish is opaque throughout. Do not overcook. Stir in the palm oil, if using.
Transfer the stew to a heated serving dish and sprinkle with the cilantro. Serve hot, with the salsa passed on the side.
